ProductInfo.Features:
Capture faraway subjects with 14x optical Zoom-NIKKOR ED glass lens (25-350mm): and macro shooting to 0.4 in. (1cm).
Optical VR Image Stabilization: minimizes the effects of camera shake for sharp, clear images.
New Intelligent AF System: determines the main subject in the photo and adjusts focus accordingly. Attain sharp clear images even when focused on small subjects.
16.0 MP CMOS: sensor enables better shots in low light and faster framing rates.
Full HD (1080p) Movie: recording with a simple push of a button. Stereo sound recording enhances movie capture, while a built-in HDMI port allows HD-TV connectivity.
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon Coolpix L610 Digital Camera, Black - Refurbished by Nikon U.S.A.
